title: PAC 12 Pumped to Play
description:
Jason Fitz, Jim Mora, Brad Edwards, and David Pollack discuss the PAC 12's decision to play this season, the SEC's upcoming weekend schedule, as well as those games that have been postponed. We also hear thoughts about the PAC 12's return from Clay Helton, Kendon Slovis.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live Crew Talks PAC 12's Return
